name: @iam-brain/opencode-codex-auth
description: Native Codex auth with multi-account rotation for OpenCode
author: iam-brain

scripts.verify: npm run typecheck && npm test && npm run build
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm version patch -m "release: v%s" && npm run build && git push origin main --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm test && npm version minor -m "release: v%s" && npm run build && git push origin main --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm test && npm version major -m "release: v%s" && npm run build && git push origin main --follow-tags
